title: An authoritarian power structure brought coronavirus to Liberty University - The Washington Post
description: An authoritarian power structure brought coronavirus to Liberty University The Washington Post Liberty University: We’re complying with virus-related ban WTOP Liberty University student tests positive for Covid-19 after Falwell reopens campus The Guardian Jer…
content: As a result, at least a dozen Liberty students have probably contracted coronavirus. Outsiders might think this decision represents only stubborn loyalty to President Trump, who is insisting American businesses should soon start reopening. In fact, its roots … [+8177 chars]
